mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post(title, user_id, content, cno) values(#{title}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update tbl_post set title = #{title}, user_id = #{userId}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() where pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tbl_post where cno = #{cno}
